summary.span: 命名空间包含用于定义常用值和引用数据类型、事件和事件处理程序、接口、特性以及处理异常的基础类和基类。

span.span: The namespace contains fundamental classes and base classes that define commonly-used value and reference data types, events and event handlers, interfaces, attributes, and processing exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其他类提供支持数据类型转换、 方法参数操作、 数学、 远程和本地程序调用、 应用程序环境管理和监督的托管和非托管应用程序的服务。Other classes provide services supporting data type conversion, method parameter manipulation, mathematics, remote and local program invocation, application environment management, and supervision of managed and unmanaged applications. 中的访问类型从 C# 代码，而无需提供完全限定的类型名称的命名空间包括`using System;`开头的源代码文件中的语句。To access types in the namespace from C# code without having to provide fully qualified type names, include the `using System;` statement at the beginning of your source code file. 中的访问类型命名空间从 C + + /cli 代码而无需提供完全限定的类型名称，包括`using namespace System;`开头的源代码文件中的语句。To access types in the namespace from C++/CLI code without having to provide fully qualified type names, include the `using namespace System;` statement at the beginning of your source code file. 此外，你必须使用编译[/clr](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fec5a8c0-40ec-484c-a213-8dec918c1d6c)切换。In addition, you must compile with the [/clr](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fec5a8c0-40ec-484c-a213-8dec918c1d6c) switch.
